subject: Order SSN4226 Missing Items From Shipment and Incorrect Item Recieved
description_text:
Hello!

My recent shipment is missing some items. 
I purchased
1x Black Plus X Pedals with Baseplate
2x VAM PRO Haptics with Power Supply
1x Simsonn Hall Handbrake 

Waybill SF6047110524783 arrived today but only the VAM PRO Haptics were delivered. The Simsonn Hall Handbrake was not included in the shipment. Can you check to see if the handbrake was successfully shipped? I would expect a second tracking number for this item. 

Secondly, the Plus X pedals that were delivered were not the black color that was ordered. The items delivered were silver instead.  I would like to arrange an exchange of this item for the correct color. 

Please let me know what you find about the missing items.

Thank you, 
Tyler  :)

conversations.body_text: 此工单已关闭并合并到工单 9467 中
